mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, email, member_name, google_id, social_type, google_access_token, google_id_token, google_refresh_token, expires_in) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{email}, #{memberName}, #{googleId}, #{socialType}, #{googleAccessToken}, #{googleIdToken}, #{googleRefreshToken}, #{expiresIn})
mapper.select: SELECT google_id, email, member_name, google_access_token, google_id_token, google_refresh_token, expires_in, social_type, member_id, member_idx FROM member WHERE google_id = #{googleId}
